name: Boots of Bearing
description: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

abilities.name: Endurance
abilities.description: Grants movement and attack speed to all nearby allies for a short while on cast.
notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
The buff of successive Endurance casts does not stack but refreshes the duration instead
Only affects player-controlled units, including invulnerable units, excluding wards
Does not share cooldowns with Drum of Endurance
Briefly turns allies immune to slows as well
Does not place the buff on units that are already affected by Drum of Endurance, and vice versa
Cannot be cast by Meepo clones

abilities.name: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description: Increases the movement speed of nearby allies by a flat amount.
notes: Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses
Multiple identical instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack, regardless of source

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Drum of Endurance was purchased as well, Boots of Bearing's icon takes priority
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus
With the Swiftness Aura, the item grants a total 85 movement speed to the wielder
The health regeneration of multiple Tranquil Boots-based items fully stacks
